Planning and executing renovation work of a 42 m² Apartment in Kreuzberg, Berlin.
From small repairs on wall and wooden floors to acoustic ceilings. New kitchen including wiring work. Retrofitting from antique wooden doors. New storage system. Next step, bathroom refurbishment ongoing.

items.description: Concept work, scenography, exhibition design and communication with in-house graphic designers and museums curatorial team. Technical coordination with specialists in lighting and carpentry. Focus on exhibits and hands-on objects with careful attention to accessibility and the existing architecture. Preliminary design submission for upcoming exhibitions at Deutsches Museum, Munich, and Open Air Museum of Ethnography Schwerin Mueß (Freilichtmuseum für Volkskunde Schwerin-Mueß).
Working at Futurium Lab, Department of Education and Participation, with graphic layouts and engraving of text panels, name tags and warning signs for the opening exhibition of the museum.
